info.name: Expense Report Service
info.description: Expense Report Service (ERS) is the next-generation v4 API for operations related to creating and processing Expense Reports. In order to interact with this API, a client must include either an authorized User or Company JWT in the header of each request, or use an X.509 client certificate with a CN included in the Allowed List by the ERS team. Contact Support: Email: expensereportservice@sap.onmicrosoft.com

header.description: The unique identifier of the user's locale that indicates the language in which the API response should be formulated.

item.name: Gets expense details for the specified expense

header.description: The unique identifier of the user's locale that indicates the language in which the API response should be formulated.

request.description: Returns expense details for the specified expense. Also returns a self link, plus each of the following links, contingent on the existence of the resource: allocations, attendees, comments, exceptions, formFields, itemizations, tax.

response.name: Expense details successfully retrieved

header.description: The unique identifier of the user's locale that indicates the language in which the API response should be formulated.
